mapper.insert: insert into part_size (id, suit_id, price, part, size, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{suitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{part,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update part_size set suit_id = #{suitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, part = #{part,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, suit_id, price, part, size, create_time, update_time from part_size
